text: Bud'te uvereny, o veruyushchiye, chto vy budete ispytany umen'sheniyem i poterey vashego imushchestva, i boleznyami, i bedami, i srazheniyami v vashey zhizni. Vy uslyshite ot tekh, komu bylo darovano Pisaniye do vas - iudeyev, khristian , a takzhe ot mnogobozhnikov,- mnogo ukorov i obid. Yesli vy budete vstrechat' vso eto s terpeniyem i smireniyem i budete blagochestivy, eto budet odnim iz blagochestivykh deyaniy, k kotorym vam nadlezhit stremit'sya
